input.sentences: i was busy making a lot of food for my friends .
they were on the balcony smoking and drinking .
they were waiting a long time for me to finish .
when i was finally done i served the food .
output.sentences: The boys were in the kitchen making dinner.
The two girls were on the balcony having a drink and a smoke.
Everyone was waiting for the boys to finish making the dinner.
After dinner everyone had a few drinks and things went blurry.
